long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pins will help you take notes on the fly and easily manage them. This extension helps to pin and use notes from any web page. Just highlight the text on any web page, right click on the highlighted text and select 'Pin It' in the opened context menu.
